unnormalised: Okay, so someone asked about finding a good PG near Christ University in Bangalore, right? It took me ages when I was looking, and the online listings? Total headache. Half the time, the address was just "Near Christ University" - helpful, *not*.

unnormalised: I remember one place, the listing said "Behind Forum Mall, Koramangala". Great location, sure, but the *actual* address turned out to be something like "Bldg No. 27, 3rd Cross Rd, Off Hosur Rd, Koramangala 560095". Google Maps took me around in circles! Another one was even worse. The ad mentioned "Opp. Jyoti Nivas College". Turns out the PG was actually on "No. 14, 1st Main, Austin Town, Bangalore 560047" - a good 15-minute auto ride away!

unnormalised: Then there were the PGs that gave just a landmark and PIN code. Something like, "Near Dairy Circle, 560076". Like, seriously? Dairy Circle is huge! You need the building name or a proper street address. I even tried calling a broker once, and all he gave me was "HRBR Layout, 2nd Block". HRBR Layout is basically a small city in itself! He said, "Just come, I'll show you". Yeah, no thanks.

unnormalised: The best way I found to navigate Bangalore's address system was to ask current students. They usually know the actual, full addresses of the PGs - "House No. 12A, 4th Ln, Teacher's Colony, Bangalore 560034" type of thing. Saves you a lot of time and frustration. Plus, they give you the real scoop on the place, not just what the online listing says.
